title: Frontend Developer
description: Develop and maintain web applications using React.js and modern JavaScript.
qualifications: BSc in Computer Science or related. 1+ year experience in frontend development.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Design and build scalable backend APIs using Node.js and Express.
qualifications: BTech/BE in IT. 2+ years experience with Node.js.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create user-centered designs and wireframes for web/mobile apps.

title: Software Intern
description: Assist in software development and testing. Great learning opportunity!
qualifications: Final year student in CS/IT. Basic programming knowledge.
